snippet: MELSKY--Barbara, born December 4th, 1930 in Brooklyn NY. Married to Barney Melsky for 64 years. Died June 8th, 2016. Barbara was survived by her husband Barney, children Brian, Beth, Blaire and Barrie. Grandchildren Tyler, Cooper, Jake, Kacie, Kyle and Mallie. Amazing wife and mother and most importantly the most incredible grandmother. Impossible to imagine life without her. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MELSKY--Barbara, born December 4th, 1930 in Brooklyn NY. Married to Barney Melsky for 64 years. Died June 8th, 2016. Barbara was survived by her husband Barney, children Brian, Beth, Blaire and Barrie. Grandchildren Tyler, Cooper, Jake, Kacie, Kyle and Mallie. Amazing wife and mother and most importantly the most incredible grandmother. Impossible to imagine life without her. 1/3
